summary: Just a simple follower based upon my own tastes. Needs ApachiiSkyHair
descriptionHtml:
Vanessa Sinclaire

Race: Nord
Class: Nightblade (feel free to add whatever spells you want to her with mods like UFO and such)
Location: Dead Man\'s Drink
Gear: Leather Armour and two Scimitars (appears nude when you meet her however)
Able to be Married

Nothing really special here as this is my first mod. I was browsing the various follower mods and none really suited what I wanted, so in the end, I made my own. She does start at level five, but will level with your character up to 100. 

OPTIONAL VERSION NOW AVAILABLE:
Optional version simply has Vanessa with a smaller chest for those who prefer that. Pick one or the other.

OPTIONAL VERSION #2 AVAILABLE:
This is a STANDALONE option. So if you prefer your own body meshes and textures, do not select this one. Please let me know if you have issues with the standalone version. I\'m still new to this and expect bugs.


Required Mods:
ApachiiSkyHair v1.5Full


Aknowledgements:
dimon99 for the DIMONIZED UNP female body
calyps for UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics
lograam for Eyes of Beauty
hellosanta for the amazing textures of SG Female Textures Renewal
apachii for ApachiiSkyHair
Jianeddie for the Sword Dancer Outfit


Remember folks! As always, if you enjoy someone\'s mod and want to show your love, Endorsements are the best way to go! That goes for any mod, not just my own!
author: Valtyr989

files.name: Sinclaire Standalone - Small Chest
files.changelogHtml:
Updated AI (No longer runs off midfight)
Increased Speed to keep up with the Player
